Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2024
Author: Legacy Legacy
Title: It was perfect
Body: I ordered the 20 oz rose quartz the only bad thing is that It came 1 day delayed but it was perfect I love the colour  and the size was perfect cuz if you don’t want to carry around a big jug of water like the 30/40 oz js get the 20 . I will say it does leak on its side so id say keep it upwards if it’s not empty other then that it’s perfect

Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2024
Author: Hyejin Son
Title: Water leaks and it doesn't keep hot even 2 hours
Body: I was happy to have stanley cup with cold drink yesterday. But today, I was dispointed. I prepared hot coffee in the morning and 2 hour later I opened my lunch bag, I found coffee leaks in my bag and it was not hot at all but just warm. I just requested my Stanley to be returning. I would like to know if mine is just defected or normal expectation.  I purchased 20 Oz one.

Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2024
Author: Moira Holloway
Title: Por ese precio esperaba algo que no filtrara
Body: Sinceramente pensé que sería más resistente a fugas de líquido. Si lo volteas el agua sale por montones. Me agrada que tenga un sistema que sirva para usar sin popote (por ejemplo para el café) pero siento que pierde gran parte de su funcionalidad al filtrar tanto. Al final siempre hay que estar asegurándote de llevarlo en algún posavasos para evitar que se incline y se derrame. Al menos mantiene el frío y el hielo por bastantes horas

Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2024

Title: You can find cheap in other brands
Body: There is a Big choice of sizes and shapes on original site but would be easier to have straw not pop up from the bottle all the timeThe Ice flow model is easer to walk around
